scout.name: Scout
scout.description: Choose an opponent's face-down asset in a Reserve line and flip it face-up. Then, discard this Scout.

skirmishers.name: Skirmishers
skirmishers.description: Remove all tokens from a Medium or Heavy asset at this Front, then discard. Primary: Destroy a Light asset.

line_infantry.name: Line Infantry
line_infantry.description: Standard front control unit. Primary: Destroy a non-Heavy asset at this Front.

trench_raiders.name: Trench Raiders
trench_raiders.description: Activate: Perform a Withdraw action on the opponent's asset at this Front. Primary: Destroy a Light asset.

artillery_battery.name: Artillery Battery
artillery_battery.description: Primary: Aim (place token) or Fire (remove token to destroy any enemy asset at this Front.

heavy_cannon.name: Heavy Cannon
heavy_cannon.description: Primary: Destroy the enemy asset at this Front OR force the opponent to Withdraw it to their hand.
